```{r}
n = 1000
X = cbind(rnorm(n), rnorm(n), rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n))
colnames(X) = paste0("X",1:ncol(X))

Y = rowSums(X)^2 
data =cbind(Y,X)
colnames(data) = c("y", colnames(X))
```


```{r}

t = proc.time()
form = formula_hal("y ~  h(X1) + h(X2) + h(X3) + h(X1,X2)", smoothness_orders = 0, data, bins = c(50,15), screen_cor_pval = NULL)
form
fit_hal(form)
proc.time() - t

```
